modName: Skyrim Re-balance Immersive Gameplay Open File
summary: A mod that works like Immersive-Gameplay for Fallout.
descriptionHtml:
I made 3 years ago and never released it. So I don't remember quite what I did here. It might require some clothes mod. Might include some which received approval. I just don't remember and can't even check

Feel free to edit and do with it as you wish.
I might get along to work on it a little bit more if people are interested.
If you take it and upload it somewhere else please credit me.

Other than that have fun.


What this mod does is make the combat more intense and realistic. By turning the world into unleveled and realistic place.  Recommend along with mods that add additional spawns.
[youtube]g7G1MdTtcOY[/youtube]
author: Erez Kristal - Boneca Industries
